attributes.action: create more Occupational Therapy jobs throughout the NHS and other services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Occupational Therapy (OT) is a fabulous job which can prevent further strain on the NHS by preventing illness and promoting independence in all.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "create more Occupational Therapy jobs throughout the NHS and other services."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15757.asp

Prime Minister's Office
